body: We are looking for talented and proactive programmer to join our team and fit the position of web application developer.Full-time/contractBudget estimation: 1600-2200 €/mo DoESkills• Develop web-based applications and web-services;• Analyse functional specifications;• Strong communication skills, including authoring and technical writing;• Assist project leader in project planning and scheduling;Requirements• 2+ years of programming experience in web based application developing using Microsoft technologies• Strong experience with web technologies (ASP.NET, ASP.NET Web API 2, C#, JavaScript, CSS, jQuery, AngularJS, Web Services)• Knowledge of OOP principles• Experience with SQL programming language• Ability to write quality, well structured, commented code• Ability to work in a team, communicative, flexible, dedicated• MVC 5, T-SQL, kendo-ui are an advantage
title: Web Application Developer
locations: Ploiești, Județul Prahova, România;Constanța, Județul Constanța, România;Brașov, Județul Brașov, România;Sibiu, Județul Sibiu, România;Cluj-Napoca, Județul Cluj, România;Timișoara, Județul Timiș, România;București, Municipiul București, România
